description: This painting depicts a woman in a yellow dress. She is sitting on a chair and looking directly at the viewer. The background is dark and there is a window behind her. The woman has long brown hair and she is wearing a white blouse and a yellow skirt. She is holding a book in her lap and her hands are clasped together. The painting is called La Sargantaine (Portrait of Júlia Peraire) and it was created by Ramon Casas i Carbó in 1899.
